SELECT -- JOURNAL 테이블 컬럼들 j.JNL_NUM, j.JNL_TITLE, j.MEMBER_NUM, j.JNL_VIEWS, j.JNL_MEMO, j.JNL_CREATE_DATE, j.JNL_UPDATE_DATE, j.JNL_PERIOD, j.JNL_TAG, j.JNL_THEME, j.JNL_AREA,
-- MEMBER 및 MEMBER_IMGS 테이블의 정보 m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, mi.MEMBER_IMG_URL,
-- JOURNAL_DAY 테이블 컬럼들 jd.JNL_NUM AS JD_JNL_NUM, jd.JNL_DAY, jd.JNL_PLACE_ORDER, jd.JNL_CONTENTS, jd.PLACE_ID,
-- JNL_IMGS 테이블 컬럼들 ji.FILE_NAME AS JNL_IMG_FILE_NAME, ji.JNL_IMGS_GUID, ji.UPLOADPATH AS JNL_IMG_UPLOADPATH, ji.JNL_IMGS_ORDER
FROM JOURNAL j JOIN MEMBER m ON j.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMGS mi ON m.MEMBER_IMGS_ID = mi.MEMBER_IMGS_ID LEFT JOIN JNL_DAY jd ON j.JNL_NUM = jd.JNL_NUM LEFT JOIN JNL_IMGS ji ON jd.JNL_NUM = ji.JNL_NUM AND jd.JNL_DAY = ji.JNL_DAY WHERE j.JNL_NUM = #{jnlNum}
SELECT jd.JNL_NUM, jd.JNL_DAY, jd.JNL_PLACE_ORDER, jd.JNL_CONTENTS, FROM JOURNAL_DAY jd WHERE jd.JNL_NUM = #{journalNum} ORDER BY jd.JNL_DAY
